findings.title: Mint function is transparent or non-existent
findings.description: Hidden mint functions may increase the amount of tokens in circulation and effect the price of the token. Owner can mint new tokens and sell.

findings.title: Hidden mint functions may increase the amount of tokens in circulation and effect the price of the token
findings.description: Mint function is transparent or non-existent. Hidden mint functions may increase the amount of tokens in circulation and effect the price of the token. Owner can mint new tokens and sell.

findings.title: Owner can mint new tokens and sell
findings.description: Mint function is transparent or non-existent. Hidden mint functions may increase the amount of tokens in circulation and effect the price of the token.

findings.title: No Balance Modifier function found
findings.description: If there is a function for this, the contract owner can have the authority to modify the balance of tokens at other addresses.

findings.title: Balance Modifier Function
findings.description: If there is a function for this, the contract owner can have the authority to modify the balance of tokens at other addresses.

findings.title: Revoke the bought tokens from the holders wallet
findings.description: The contract owner can have the authority to modify the balance of tokens at other addresses, allowing them to revoke the bought tokens from the holder's wallet.

findings.title: Balance Modifier Function Vulnerability
findings.description: The contract owner has the authority to modify the balance of tokens at other addresses, allowing them to revoke bought tokens from holders' wallets.

findings.title: No Blacklist Setting function found
findings.description: If there is a blacklist, some addresses may not be able to trade normally. Example: you buy the token and right after your Wallet getting blacklisted. Like so you will be unable to sell. Honeypot Risk.

findings.title: Some addresses may not be able to trade normally
findings.description: If there is a blacklist, some addresses may not be able to trade normally.

findings.title: Honeypot Risk
findings.description: The contract owner may contain the authority to modify the transaction tax. If the transaction tax is increased to more than 49%, the tokens may not be able to be traded.

findings.title: Whitelist Setting function found
findings.description: If there is a function for this, Developer can set zero fee or no max wallet size for adresses (for example team wallets can trade without fee. Can cause farming)

findings.title: Developer can set zero fee or no max wallet size for addresses
findings.description: If there is a function for this, Developer can set zero fee or no max wallet size for adresses (for example team wallets can trade without fee. Can cause farming)

findings.title: No Hidden or multi owner with authorisation
findings.description: For contract with a hidden owner, developer can still manipulate the contract even if the ownership has been abandoned.

findings.title: Hidden Owner Manipulation
findings.description: For contract with a hidden owner, developer can still manipulate the contract even if the ownership has been abandoned.
